actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to transfer custodianship and operating responsibility for Pershing Hall in Paris, France, and provide for its administration as a memorial.

summary.text: Directs the President to designate a Federal agency as the custodian of Pershing Hall, Paris, France. Permits such Federal agency to enter into an agreement with the Reserve Officers Association and the Veterans of Foreign Wars to maintain Pershing Hall as a memorial. Allows the Reserve Officers Association and the Veterans of Foreign Wars to contract with a nonprofit foundation to operate and maintain Pershing Hall.

titles.title: A bill to transfer custodianship and operating responsibility for Pershing Hall in Paris, France, and provide for its administration as a memorial.
